string.text: Clear Sky patch
An insignia torn from a uniform of the Clear Sky faction.
Freedom patch
An insignia torn from a uniform of the Freedom faction.
Loner patch
An insignia torn from the uniform of a loner.
Ecologist patch
An insignia torn from the uniform of an ecologist.
Bandit patch
An insignia torn from the uniform of a bandit.
Duty patch
An insignia torn from a uniform of the Duty faction.
Monolith patch
An insignia torn from a uniform of the Monolith faction.
Army patch
An insignia torn from a uniform of the Ukrainian army.
Mercenary patch
An insignia torn from the uniform of a mercenary.
Clear Sky faction patch

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members, and the reasoning behind it is simple: the higher the count, the better the skills. They are also a proof that you won't hesitate to kill someone with your own hands to achieve your goals. For this reason, it can be extremely dangerous to display the patch to the wrong people, but it can also open important doors for you.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
